operations.notes: You must provide the user's login id or email address along with a password when authenticating users that are registered in QuickBlox, see authentication and authorization for more information. See Social Networks integration to learn more using other platforms, like facebook, for authenticating users.

parameters.name: login
parameters.description: The user's login, you must provide either the user's login or email.

parameters.name: email
parameters.description: The user's email address, you must provide either the user's login or email.

parameters.name: provider
parameters.description: Name of the social network provider, eg. facebook, twitter etc.

parameters.name: scope
parameters.description: List of permisions required by the app to social networking platforms.

parameters.name: keys[token]
parameters.description: The social network platform's token returned when the user logged in.

parameters.name: keys[secret]
parameters.description: Your app's access token secret for the social network platform (currently only required for Twitter integration)

operations.notes: Calling this api downgrades the token to an API session token
